content_html: Galkot (Baglung), Sept 17: A massive landslide triggered by continuous rainfall has blocked the Baglung section of the Kaligandaki Corridor, a project of national pride, since this morning. The landslide occurred at Belbagar in Jaimini municipality-8, completely halting traffic along the route. Due to the scale of th
